title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
itunes:title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1:

Ken Matthews guest hosts. There's a coup going on in America. What's the state of your state? Networks have banned the F-word (fraud). The media doesn't have any power in tallying or certifying votes. Where are the right's poll watchers? Trump attracted young and minorities to GOP. Major Garrett gives people who want their votes counted a lecture, insult and threat. Programmer on manipulating voting source code.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2:

Ken Matthews explains what he means by "stealing the election." Riots. Computer stuff and analysis proving fraudulent votes, but news is censoring and mocking it. Where are the GOP and these politicians with fancy websites? Why do you or don't you wear a mask? Biden's just mimicking Trump's successful plan for the coronavirus.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3:

Ken Matthews on the protections our founding fathers gave us to use in a moment like this against Obama, Biden, and Team China. Bernie Sanders would take the secretary of labor job. We're supposed to believe people who've been lying to us for decades? Ask our reps: Do you own any interest in that vote-counting company? News media ranges from funny to anger-inducing. Most teachers want to go back to work. Bill Gates. There's too much fraud, and we're not gonna let you steal our election. We have to step up.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
